subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The game will be made up Thursday at Yankee Stadium at 1 p.m., with the same starters, the Yankees’ Mike Mussina and the Tigers’ Justin Verlander, scheduled to pitch.
snippet: The game will be made up Thursday at Yankee Stadium at 1 p.m., with the same starters, the Yankees’ Mike Mussina and the Tigers’ Justin Verlander, scheduled to pitch.
